transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I take you to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I pick you up in the morning.
🚌 I am bigger than a car.
🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out when I stop.

transport.question: I fly in the sky, and I can take you very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings and an engine.
🌍 I can fly you to other countries.

transport.question: I float on the water and can carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I don't drive on land.
⚓ I might have a horn that makes a loud sound.
🚢 You can take me on vacation.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can be very long. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I don't drive on roads.
🚂 I often carry people or goods between cities.
📢 I make a 'choo choo' sound.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 You need to balance to ride me.
🚴 You wear a helmet when riding me.
🔔 I might have a bell you can ring.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down and have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I am smaller than an airplane.
🚨 You might see me helping people in emergencies.
🪶 My blades go around and around to make me fly.

transport.question: I travel under the ground in a tunnel. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I have many stops in a city.
💡 You need a ticket to ride me.
🔦 It can be dark where I travel.

transport.question: I am a car that helps people who are sick or hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a siren that goes 'wee woo'.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚨 I have flashing lights.

transport.question: I am a type of motorcycle with three wheels that you can ride to get around town. What am I?

hints.text: 🛵 People sometimes use me to carry things
🪙 I'm common in south-east Asia
🛺 I'm like a taxi

transport.question: I take you up a mountain without you having to walk. What am I?

hints.text: 🚠 I hang from a rope.
🏔️ You see great views from me.
⛷️ Skiers often use me.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and I need water to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a tiny seed.
💧 I need sunshine and water.
💐 I can be colorful and pretty.

plant.question: I am big and tall, with many leaves and branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am bigger than a bush.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am green and grow low to the ground. You can walk on me and play on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 Animals eat me.
⚽ I am often in parks and yards.
🚜 You cut me with a lawnmower.

plant.question: I am long, orange, and grow underground. Bugs Bunny loves to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐇 I am crunchy and sweet.
👀 I am good for your eyes.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers that can be red, pink, or white. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People give me as a gift.
💘 I am a symbol of love.
🥀 Be careful of my sharp points.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated and can be covered in butter. You eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am made from corn.
🎬 I taste good with salt.
🌽 I am yellow before I pop.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on trees. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥥 I am a fruit.
🌴 I grow in warm places.
🐒 I have milk inside.

plant.question: I am a plant that climbs and wraps around things. I make a sweet treat that bees love to find inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I am a type of flower.
💜 I can be purple or white.
🐝 I attract lots of buzzy friends.

plant.question: I am a plant with a thick stem that grows underwater and has a big, flat leaf. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am found in ponds.
🏵️ My flower is beautiful.
🐟 Fish like to swim near me.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant with many segments. I grow quickly and some pandas love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🎋 I am often used to make furniture.
🐼 I am a favorite food for certain bears.
🟩 I can be green or yellow.
